docs.snippet: The Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez will receive a $6 million bonus if he reaches one of baseball’s most famous numbers, 660, the career home run total of Willie Mays....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez will receive a $6 million bonus if he reaches one of baseball’s most famous numbers, 660, the career home run total of Willie Mays.
docs.abstract: Keeping Score column notes that New York Yankee's slugger Alex Rodriguez is in position to surpass 660 career home run total of Willie Mays, feat that will earn him $6 million bonus; notes that along way Rodriguez has not only passed some of the greatest hitters to ever play, but has also passed players whose careers, like his own, are shrouded by links to performance-enhancing drugs.
